channel.title: Forecast Analyst's Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Forecast Analyst's Blog

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Rich Content
item.description: Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds.

item.title: Emoji Support
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways.

item.title: Math Typesetting
item.description: Mathematical notation in a Hugo project can be enabled by using third party JavaScript libraries.

item.title: Happy Birthday Chords
item.description: Happy ABirthday Eto youHappy EBirthday Ato youHappy A7Birthday dear DJohnnyHappy ABirthday Eto Ayou

item.title: About Author
item.description: I am John Doe and currently working as a forecast analyst. I have been learning data analytics every day and taking notes using Microsoft OneNote. I think it would be interesting if I make my notes public, which is why I am creating this blog. I will spend a couple of minutes everyday and blog something I have learned every day. Hope some of my blogs can be helpful to some of the people.

item.title: Features of Ramium
item.description: Ramium is Packed with awesome features that makes your blog powerful and easy to use.

item.title: About Ramium
item.description: Ramium is an awesome hugo theme for creating personal blogs. Apparently, none of the existing hugo themes were what I wanted them to be for my new blog. Or maybe I just could not find the right one. So I took upon the courtesy of making the perfect one for my own. And thus takes the birth of Ramium that I’m very proud of. Coding this theme has been very fun.
